name: Scrambled (itch)
description:
I created Scrambled for part of my 'Game-a-Week' uni assignment, where we create a game every week, for 7 weeks. The theme for the sixth week was 'Secrets'. Which meant that we could choose any game idea we desired, as long as it involved 'secrets' in one way or another. I chose to create a level based game where you have to de-scramble the word and click the correct image/item, whilst trying to complete each level within the given time and trying not to click the bombs.  I thoroughly enjoyed making this game so i will most likely add to and improve it in the future if i see potential to do so. 

Download the game and let me know what you think!

Also check out my other games on my profile!
